Title: Clarifies that the statutory damages available for certain wage violations are not punitive in nature and are designed to compensate workers
Summary: Clarifies that the statutory damages available for certain wage violations are not punitive in nature and are designed to be liquidated damages rather than penalties or to compensate workers for the employer's failure to prevent wage theft and for the harm to employees that results from such failure.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the labor law, in relation to liquidated damages for labor law violations
